targets.query: SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~   /^periodic.*pelorus-master.*4.10.*-e2e.*/   AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~  /^periodic.*pelorus-master.*4.10.*-e2e.*/   AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*pelorus-master.*4.10.*-e2e.*/   AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~  /^periodic.*pelorus-master.*4.10.*-e2e.*/  AND "state" = 'flake' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~   /^periodic.*pelorus-master.*4.10.*-e2e.*scenario-1.*/   AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~  /^periodic.*pelorus-master.*4.10.*-e2e.*scenario-2.*/  AND "state" = 'flake' ) AND $timeFilter
